projects.desc: Search and add (local) your favourite Friends quotes

projects.title: An Adalabers portfolio platform

projects.full-desc: An online platform created to help travellers discover the best of different cities around the world through my own personal experiences.

projects.title: Some functionalities of the X (former Twitter) front-end
projects.desc: Web application to discovering & uploading new projects
projects.full-desc: Some of X's functionalities replicated, as compose a new post with modal window, render post list from API and save in Local Storage, including routes to profile, compose and searcher
